Hello there!

As you can see I'm Adam. I'm a software engineer and I love to build things. I'm currently working on Thalwyrn, a little minecraft RPG server with a custom resourcepack. I mainly act as a Sysadmin and Backend Developer for the project, keeping it running so the team can push updates and make meaningful changes.
